trans-unit.source: Provides a constructor-like means of calling <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.DbExpressionBuilder.NewRow(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression}})" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um meio semelhante a construtor de chamar <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.DbExpressionBuilder.NewRow(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression}})" />.

trans-unit.source: A key-value pair that provides the first column in the new row instance.
trans-unit.target: Um par chave-valor que fornece a primeira coluna na nova instância de linha.

trans-unit.source: A key-value pairs that provide any subsequent columns in the new row instance.
trans-unit.target: Um par chave-valor que fornece quaisquer colunas subsequentes na nova instância de linha.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.Row" /> class with the specified first column value and optional successive column values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.Row" /> com o valor da primeira coluna especificado e valores de colunas sucessivas opcionais.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified row to a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte a linha especificada em um <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that represents the converted row.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> que representa a linha convertida.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression" /> that constructs a new row based on the columns contained in this Row instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression" /> que constrói uma nova linha com base nas colunas contidas nesta instância de linha.

trans-unit.source: A new DbNewInstanceExpression that constructs a row with the same column names and DbExpression values as this Row instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo DbNewInstanceExpression que constrói uma linha com os mesmos nomes de coluna e valores de DbExpression que esta instância de linha.
